items.title: Why India Shelter stands out in the over-crowded low-cost housing finance space
items.description: Unique business model and deep distribution reach to drive growth and profitability

items.title: Chart of the Day: Thermal power plant utilisation gains pace in February
items.description: The plant load factor of thermal power plants rose to about 73 percent in February 2025

items.title: Hindustan Unilever gets CCI nod to acquire Minimalist in Rs 2,670 cr deal
items.description: Jaipur-based Uprising Science is engaged in the manufacturing and sale of beauty and personal care products, baby care and hair care items under the brand name 'Minimalist'

items.title: PC Jeweller board approves allotment of 51.7 crore shares  to 14 banks for settling Rs 1510 crore debt
items.description: The terms and conditions of approved OTS include cash and equity components payable under the settlement, release of securities and mortgaged properties etc.

items.title: SBI Life: Risk of a cap on bancassurance overplayed, buy for long term
items.description: SBI Life continues to maintain its leadership position among private life insurers

items.title: Global pharma giants Eli Lilly, Novo Nordisk launch obesity awareness campaigns, exploring India market potential
items.description: Novo and Lilly’s campaigns are not limited to advertisements alone, and both companies are trying to raise awareness around obesity through research studies and conferences.

items.title: Ashok Hinduja says it is 'opportune time' to increase stake in IndusInd Bank
items.description: IIHL also announced the completion of Reliance Capital's acquisition

items.title: Bajaj Auto reappoints Rajiv Bajaj as MD, CEO for another term, to infuse Rs 1,500 crore in credit arm
items.description: The Bajaj Auto arm has a turnover of Rs 16.65 crore as on March 31, 2024, and has a net worth of Rs 258.23 crore, according to the stock filing.

items.title: Cipla enters into exclusive pact with Formosa to distribute ophthalmic drug
items.description: Under this agreement, Cipla has exclusive rights to market the innovative treatment for post-operative inflammation and pain following ocular surgery across 11 countries such as India, South Africa, Nepal, Sri Lanka, Bangladesh, Malaysia, Myanmar, Kenya, Nigeria, Argentina, and Colombia.

items.title: NPCIL, sole operator of India's nuclear plants, says 'renaissance' underway in journey to 50 GW capacity
items.description: Trump's presidency will be a boost to India's nuclear ambitions, NPCIL's chairman Bhuwan Chandra Pathak said, adding that the PSU plans to invest at least Rs 6.6 lakh crore to build 50 gigawatts (GW) nuclear power capacity.
